review: Consulted@Promed Hospital reg ADHD in 4.8yr 'F' child. Consult Fees Rs1250 and was adviced to go to Synapse institute for assesment therapies (behaviour/speech/physio) I didnt get any new info from consultation beyond what you get in web etc. but fees charged is 2.5x for ADHD category. Dr Rao mentioned that Paediatric Neurologist from UK universities do not give medications for <8yr kids, ** ** ****** ** ******* *** *** **** ** ****** *** **** ****** **** **** ******************** ***** *** *** *** *** **** ***** **** ********* ********* ** ****** ***** ** ******* ** **** **** ****** ******** ******* ******************* **** **** ** ****** *** **** ***** ******* **** ** ***** ***** Rest do best for your child.Thanks and hope review is useful to patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We had been consulting with the doctor from birth till 5 months. She is someone who believes I’m not giving unnecessary medications to the baby which is good. But she isn’t very friendly. It’s very difficult for new parents to ask her questions. She is rude at times. She is undoubtedly a good doctor but a little more patience and friendliness would help. That’s the reason I changed the pead for my baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have been consulting Dr. Shalini for our daughter since her birth and have always found her extremely approachable. She doesn't mind responding to our parental concerns on Whatsapp either. Another reason why we trust her with the health of our little girl is that she doesn't unnecessarily prescribe medication. We strongly recommend her and our grateful to have her as our child's doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shalini Rao is very patient and polite. And explains the problems well. This my first visit and we were very comfortable and pleased with the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Have been consulting Dr.Shalini right from the birth of my baby. She explains everything in detail, takes queries patiently and the best part is not recommending any unnecessary medicines for the baby.
Very communicative doctor. Good response and accurate. Would recommend everyone. Have visited her after previous bad experiences with other child neuro doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Thank you doctor for your valuable advise for my daughter 
And how smoothly the vaccination happened today
We were very scared but you handled it with utmost care
Thank you sooo much
Also for waiting for us since we were late reaching hospital due to traffic

review: Doctor wont recommend unnecessary medicines to kids which is rare that you can see from today's corporate doctor's, she always suggests home remedies and natural cure.
